question: What do most living things use to make atp from glucose?

nodes.text: Enzymes are what most living things use to make ATP from glucose.
Carbon is used by most living things to make ATP from glucose.
Nitrogen is what most living things use to make ATP from glucose.
Oxygen is used by most living things to make ATP from glucose.
